mapper.insert: insert into v_apply (sid, vid, va_time, va_flag, va_reviewer) values(#{sid}, #{vid}, #{va_time}, #{va_flag}, #{va_reviewer})
mapper.select: select va.va_flag, va.va_reviewer, v.vid, v.name, v.abs, v.etime from user u inner join v_apply va inner join vol_table v on u.u_id=va.sid and v.vid=va.vid where va.sid=#{u_id} order by va.va_flag desc
select va.va_id, v.name, u.u_name, va.va_flag, va.va_reviewer from user u join v_apply va join vol_table v on u.u_id=va.sid and v.vid=va.vid order by va.va_flag
